title: Nevada Firm Recalls Raw Pork Nugget Products Containing Wheat Due To Misbranding and Undeclared Allergens
summary: WASHINGTON, June 26, 2014 Mr. Wok Foods, a Las Vegas, Nev. establishment, is recalling approximately 14,760 pounds of raw pork nugget product because of misbranding and undeclared allergen. The product contains wheat, a known allergen, which is not declared on the product labels. The product...

establishment.name: Mr Wok Foods Inc. dba Maxfield Foods
establishment.address:
3695 E Post Road 
  Las Vegas, NV 89120

impacted_products: 10 lb. cases of “Battered, deep fried pork nugget” with packaging dates between JAN 25 2014 and JUN 25 2014
